quote: Most of the evil in this world is done by people with good intentions. – T.S. Eliot
fact: The first automobile race ever seen in the United States was held in Chicago in 1895. The track ran from Chicago to Evanston, Illinois. The winner was J. Frank Duryea, whose average speed was 71/2 miles per hour.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I really want to buy one of those supermarket checkout dividers, but the cashier keeps putting it back.
